meanings.definition: To sew a hem on (a garment)
meanings.sent1: She is rehemming the pants to make them shorter.
meanings.sent2: I will rehem the dress to make it fit better.
meanings.sent3: The tailor was rehemming the skirt, but accidentally sewed it shut!
meanings.sent4: Her fingers moved swiftly, rehemming the fabric with precision.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the needle rehemming the cloth filled the room.

meanings.definition: The act of sewing a hem on (a garment)
meanings.sent1: The rehemming of the curtains took longer than expected.
meanings.sent2: I learned the art of rehemming from my grandmother.
meanings.sent3: The rehemming of the tablecloth turned into a fun family project.
meanings.sent4: The rehemming of the shirt symbolized a fresh start for the wearer.
meanings.sent5: The neat rehemming on the dress caught everyone's eye at the party.
